text: Notepad++ is a text editor and source code editor for Microsoft Windows. Notepad++ is distributed as free software and licensed under the GNU General Public License. ==Usage in China== In 2020, Notepad++ was banned by China. This is because the developers protested about Hong Kong and Uyghur affairs.China Bans Free Text Editor Notepad++Popular Notepad++ text editor banned in China == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Word processors
title: Notepad++
